item.title: Praise the Rain, by Joy Harjo
item.description: What does praise mean to you? Joy Harjo gives the perspective that one can and should praise no matter how they feel.

item.title: Ode to Buttoning and Unbuttoning My Shirt, by Ross Gay
item.description: Like Epictetus calls us to see the mortality in our family and friends, Ross Gay tells us about the importance to be present in the small things so that we can also be present in the bigger things.
